name: Astral·Destiny
description: It is made from the precious minerals extracted from the stars. The star ore makes the weapon extremely sharp. It can cause destructive damage to the enemy simply by waving it.

name: Astral·Lightning Bolt
description: Made of the precious minerals extracted from stars, the shape of the Knives is quite unique. When the short sword is used, it brings out starry lights, Making the enemy dizzy.

name: Astral·Mage
description: It is made of the precious minerals extracted from stars. The strong magic adaptability makes its power more stable. It is the mage's best choice.

name: Astral·Reaper
description: The dangerous weapon made of the precious minerals extracted from the stars has a shining appearance, which will make people who stare at it lose their souls.

name: Astral·Star Elegy
description: It is made of the precious minerals extracted from the stars. The sharpest ore was fired and shaped day and night. It is extremely sharp. The three blood slots on it are particularly deadly to the creatures attacked by it.

name: Astral·Star Eye
description: Made from the precious ores from the stars, the bow gives out a starry shine. The arrow shot by this bow is so powerful that it is much sought after by all archers.

name: Astral·Star Rage
description: It is made from the precious minerals extracted from the stars. Repeated firing makes it very heavy. It can cause great harm when used.

name: Astral·Star Wall
description: It was made of precious minerals refined through stars. The light was 1/10 of a common shield. It looks dark in the daytime, but resonates with the stars at night and creates a grand light wall to effectively defend enemy's attack.

name: Astral·Streamer Adjudication
description: The sword made of the precious minerals extracted from stars gives out a starry shine. The halo on it makes people scared.

name: Asuka Hat
description: I'll never embarrass myself by putting this on! Meow~

name: Asuka Helmet
description: Asuka Shikinami Langley's personal combat helmet.

name: Attached Sword [1]
description: The name of the maker is unknown. Forged by the ancient method, it is more like a piece of art than a weapon.

name: Attached Sword [2]
description: The name of the maker is unknown. Forged by the ancient method, it is more like a piece of art than a weapon.

name: Attack Card
description: As Thor, God of War, Used Mjolnir, it generated sparks that dropped into man's world and turned into a card full of God of War's power. Atk can be boosted when blending the power of the card with the adventurer's will through Valkyrie.
